original_title: Du har lovet mig en kone!
overview: Du har lovet mig en kone! (English: You have promised me a wife!) is a 1935 Norwegian comedy film written by Tancred Ibsen, and co-directed by Ibsen and Einar Sissener, starring Sissener, Randi Br√¶nne and Kirsten Heiberg.
title: Du har lovet mig en kone!
